es.definition: Condición o término que depende de ciertas circunstancias o eventos.

pt.definition: Condição ou termo que depende de certas circunstâncias ou eventos.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Palabras que describen o modifican sustantivos.

definition: Condition or term that depends on certain circumstances or events.
examples: The agreement includes a conditional clause based on future performance.
Conditional love can be problematic in relationships.
She set up a conditional rule for the automated process.

es.definition: Expresar o comunicar ideas, sentimientos o pensamientos.

pt.definition: Expressar ou comunicar ideias, sentimentos ou pensamentos.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Palabras que expresan acciones, estados o procesos.

definition: Expressing or communicating ideas, feelings, or thoughts.
examples: She was expressing her concerns about the project.
Expressing gratitude can improve relationships.
He has a talent for expressing complex concepts in simple terms.

es.definition: Las opciones o situaciones que pueden ocurrir en el futuro.

pt.definition: As opções ou situações que podem ocorrer no futuro.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Palabras que nombran personas, animales, lugares, cosas, ideas o fenómenos.

definition: The options or situations that may occur in the future.
examples: Exploring all possibilities is essential in problem-solving.
There are endless possibilities for innovation in technology.
The possibilities are limitless when you have an open mind.

es.definition: Relacionado con una suposición o hipótesis en lugar de un hecho real.

pt.definition: Relacionado com uma suposição ou hipótese em vez de um fato real.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Palabras que describen o modifican sustantivos.

definition: Related to a supposition or hypothesis rather than a real fact.
examples: In a hypothetical scenario, what would you do?
The experiment is based on a hypothetical situation.
Discussing hypothetical questions can be thought-provoking.

es.definition: Las circunstancias o requisitos bajo los cuales algo sucede o se lleva a cabo.

pt.definition: As circunstâncias ou requisitos sob os quais algo acontece ou é realizado.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Palabras que nombran personas, animales, lugares, cosas, ideas o fenómenos.

definition: The circumstances or requirements under which something happens or is carried out.
examples: The project's success depends on certain conditions being met.
Under ideal conditions, the machine operates efficiently.
Negotiating the terms and conditions of the contract is crucial.

es.definition: El elemento principal o más importante de algo.

pt.definition: O elemento principal ou mais importante de algo.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Palabras que describen o modifican sustantivos.

definition: The primary or most important element of something.
examples: The main purpose of this meeting is to discuss the project's progress.
She plays a main role in the success of the company.
The main focus should be on improving customer satisfaction.

es.definition: Divisiones o secciones de algo más grande.

pt.definition: Divisões ou seções de algo maior.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Palabras que nombran personas, animales, lugares, cosas, ideas o fenómenos.

definition: Divisions or sections of something larger.
examples: The car's engine consists of many different parts.
He analyzed all parts of the problem to find a solution.
The book is divided into several parts for easier reading.

es.definition: Una parte de una oración que contiene un sujeto y un verbo.

pt.definition: Uma parte de uma sentença que contém um sujeito e um verbo.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Palabras que nombran personas, animales, lugares, cosas, ideas o fenómenos.

definition: A part of a sentence that contains a subject and a verb.
examples: The conditional clause in the contract specifies certain conditions.
Understanding the subordinate clause is essential for comprehension.
This sentence has a main clause and a subordinate clause.

es.definition: Colecciones de objetos o elementos relacionados.

pt.definition: Coleções de objetos ou elementos relacionados.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Palabras que nombran personas, animales, lugares, cosas, ideas o fenómenos.

definition: Collections of related objects or elements.
examples: She has a vast collection of LEGO sets.
The math problem involves finding the intersection of two sets.
The toolset includes various tools for different tasks.

es.definition: El producto o consecuencia de una acción o proceso.

pt.definition: O produto ou consequência de uma ação ou processo.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Palabras que nombran personas, animales, lugares, cosas, ideas o fenómenos.

definition: The product or consequence of an action or process.
examples: The positive result of their efforts was a successful project.
The result of the experiment surprised the researchers.
We will have to wait and see the final result of the competition.

es.definition: Categorías o clases de objetos o fenómenos con características similares.

pt.definition: Categorias ou classes de objetos ou fenômenos com características semelhantes.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Palabras que nombran personas, animales, lugares, cosas, ideas o fenómenos.

definition: Categories or classes of objects or phenomena with similar characteristics.
examples: There are various types of flowers in the garden.
He studied different types of birds in his research.
The library has a wide selection of book types.

es.definition: Comunicar pensamientos, sentimientos o ideas de manera verbal o escrita.

pt.definition: Comunicar pensamentos, sentimentos ou ideias de forma verbal ou escrita.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Palabras que expresan acciones, estados o procesos.

definition: To communicate thoughts, feelings, or ideas verbally or in writing.
examples: She expresses her emotions through art.
He expresses his opinions on social issues through blogging.
The poem beautifully expresses the beauty of nature.

es.definition: Partes de una oración que contienen un sujeto y un verbo y pueden funcionar como una unidad independiente.

pt.definition: Partes de uma sentença que contêm um sujeito e um verbo e podem funcionar como uma unidade independente.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Palabras que nombran personas, animales, lugares, cosas, ideas o fenómenos.

definition: Parts of a sentence that contain a subject and a verb and can function as an independent unit.
examples: There are different types of clauses in grammar.
The independent clause can stand alone as a sentence.
Understanding complex clauses can be challenging.

es.definition: Utilizado para introducir una condición o suposición.

pt.definition: Usado para introduzir uma condição ou suposição.

type_word.name: Conjunction
type_word.description: Palabras que conectan palabras, frases, cláusulas u oraciones.

definition: Used to introduce a condition or supposition.
examples: If it rains, we will stay indoors.
He will come to the party if he has time.
If you study hard, you will pass the exam.

es.definition: La acción de precipitación de agua desde las nubes en forma de gotas líquidas.

pt.definition: A ação de precipitação de água das nuvens em forma de gotas líquidas.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Palabras que expresan acciones, estados o procesos.

definition: The action of precipitation of water from clouds in the form of liquid drops.
examples: It usually rains a lot in this region during the summer.
If it rains, we should take umbrellas with us.
The forecast predicts heavy rains for the weekend.

es.definition: Vegetación verde que cubre el suelo en áreas naturales o jardines.

pt.definition: Vegetação verde que cobre o solo em áreas naturais ou jardins.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Palabras que nombran personas, animales, lugares, cosas, ideas o fenómenos.

definition: Green vegetation that covers the ground in natural areas or gardens.
examples: Children love to play on the grass in the park.
He mowed the grass in his backyard over the weekend.
The golf course has beautifully manicured grass.

es.definition: La tercera persona del singular del verbo 'get', que significa obtener o recibir algo.

pt.definition: A terceira pessoa do singular do verbo 'get', que significa obter ou receber algo.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Palabras que expresan acciones, estados o procesos.

definition: The third person singular form of the verb 'get,' which means to obtain or receive something.
examples: She gets good grades in school.
He gets a lot of praise for his work.
If he gets the job, he will be happy.

es.definition: Estar cubierto o impregnado de líquido, especialmente agua.

pt.definition: Estar coberto ou impregnado de líquido, especialmente água.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Palabras que describen o modifican sustantivos.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Palabras que expresan acciones, estados o procesos.

definition: To be covered or soaked in liquid, especially water.
examples: Her clothes got wet in the rain.
The wet grass made the ground slippery.
He had to dry his wet hair with a towel.

es.definition: Que puede suceder o realizarse; que es factible o viable.

pt.definition: Que pode acontecer ou ser realizado; que é factível ou viável.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Palabras que describen o modifican sustantivos.

definition: That which can happen or be achieved; that is feasible or viable.
examples: With hard work, anything is possible.
Is it possible to reach that goal in a year?
He considered all possible solutions to the problem.

es.definition: Ocurrencias o sucesos específicos que tienen lugar en un período de tiempo determinado.

pt.definition: Ocorrências ou eventos específicos que ocorrem durante um período de tempo determinado.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Palabras que nombran personas, animales, lugares, cosas, ideas o fenómenos.

definition: Specific occurrences or events that take place during a specified period of time.
examples: The sporting events attracted a large audience.
Corporate events are often held to celebrate achievements.
There are many cultural events happening in the city this weekend.

es.definition: Unir o mezclar dos o más cosas para formar una sola entidad.

pt.definition: Unir ou misturar duas ou mais coisas para formar uma única entidade.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Palabras que expresan acciones, estados o procesos.

definition: To unite or mix two or more things to form a single entity.
examples: She combines different ingredients to create a delicious dish.
The project combines art and technology seamlessly.
His work combines traditional and modern elements.

es.definition: Una prueba o evaluación de conocimientos o habilidades, generalmente escrita u oral.

pt.definition: Um teste ou avaliação de conhecimentos ou habilidades, geralmente escrito ou oral.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Palabras que nombran personas, animales, lugares, cosas, ideas o fenómenos.

definition: A test or assessment of knowledge or skills, typically written or oral.
examples: He has an important exam tomorrow morning.
The final exam will cover all the topics we studied.
Taking exams can be stressful for students.

es.definition: La posición numérica que sigue a la segunda y precede a la cuarta.

pt.definition: A posição numérica que segue a segunda e precede a quarta.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Palabras que describen o modifican sustantivos.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Palabras que nombran personas, animales, lugares, cosas, ideas o fenómenos.

definition: The numerical position that follows the second and precedes the fourth.
examples: He finished in third place in the race.
This is the third time I've tried to explain it.
The third chapter of the book is the most exciting.

es.definition: Poco probable o improbable de ocurrir.

pt.definition: Pouco provável ou improvável de acontecer.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Palabras que describen o modifican sustantivos.

definition: Not likely or improbable to occur.
examples: It's highly unlikely that he will arrive on time.
An unlikely series of events led to their meeting.
Winning the lottery is extremely unlikely.

es.definition: El pasado del verbo 'win', que significa ganar o triunfar en algo.

pt.definition: O passado do verbo 'win', que significa ganhar ou ter sucesso em algo.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Palabras que expresan acciones, estados o procesos.

definition: The past tense of the verb 'win,' which means to gain or succeed in something.
examples: She won first place in the competition.
They won the championship last year.
I won a prize in the raffle.

es.definition: Un juego de azar en el que los participantes compran boletos para tener la posibilidad de ganar un premio.

pt.definition: Um jogo de azar em que os participantes compram bilhetes com a possibilidade de ganhar um prêmio.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Palabras que nombran personas, animales, lugares, cosas, ideas o fenómenos.

definition: A game of chance in which participants purchase tickets for the chance to win a prize.
examples: He bought a lottery ticket in hopes of winning the jackpot.
Winning the lottery can change someone's life dramatically.
The proceeds from the lottery go to fund various public programs.

es.definition: La posición numérica que sigue a la tercera y precede a la quinta.

pt.definition: A posição numérica que segue a terceira e precede a quinta.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Palabras que describen o modifican sustantivos.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Palabras que nombran personas, animales, lugares, cosas, ideas o fenómenos.

definition: The numerical position that follows the third and precedes the fifth.
examples: She finished in fourth place in the race.
This is the fourth time I've seen that movie.
The fourth chapter of the book is the most exciting.

es.definition: Que no es real o que parece irreal debido a su naturaleza inusual.

pt.definition: Que não é real ou que parece irreal devido à sua natureza incomum.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Palabras que describen o modifican sustantivos.

definition: Not real or seeming unreal due to its unusual nature.
examples: The special effects in the movie made the scenes look unreal.
His success in such a short time seemed unreal to many.
The dream had an unreal quality to it.

es.definition: El pasado del verbo 'have', que se utiliza para indicar posesión, experiencia pasada y otras situaciones.

pt.definition: O passado do verbo 'have', que é usado para indicar posse, experiência passada e outras situações.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Palabras que expresan acciones, estados o procesos.

definition: The past tense of the verb 'have,' which is used to indicate possession, past experience, and other situations.
examples: She had a beautiful garden in her backyard.
I had a great time at the party last night.
They had already eaten when we arrived.

es.definition: La forma pasada y pasada del verbo 'study', que significa adquirir conocimientos mediante la lectura o el aprendizaje.

pt.definition: A forma passada e passada do verbo 'study', que significa adquirir conhecimentos por meio da leitura ou do aprendizado.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Palabras que expresan acciones, estados o procesos.

definition: The past and past participle form of the verb 'study,' which means to acquire knowledge through reading or learning.
examples: She studied diligently for her exams.
He had studied the subject extensively before the presentation.
They studied the history of ancient civilizations.

es.definition: Más difícil en comparación con algo más fácil.

pt.definition: Mais difícil em comparação com algo mais fácil.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Palabras que describen o modifican sustantivos.

type_word.name: Adverb
type_word.description: Palabras que modifican verbos, adjetivos, otros adverbios o frases enteras.

definition: More difficult in comparison to something easier.
examples: Learning a new language can be harder as an adult.
The second level of the game is much harder than the first.
She worked harder to improve her skills.

es.definition: La forma pasada y el participio pasado del verbo 'pass', que significa avanzar o aprobar algo.

pt.definition: A forma passada e o particípio passado do verbo 'pass', que significa avançar ou aprovar algo.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Palabras que expresan acciones, estados o procesos.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Palabras que describen o modifican sustantivos.

definition: The past and past participle form of the verb 'pass,' which means to advance or succeed in something.
examples: She passed the exam with flying colors.
They passed the finish line together.
The passed legislation will bring about changes.

es.definition: En funcionamiento o realizando acciones; no pasivo o inactivo.

pt.definition: Em funcionamento ou realizando ações; não passivo ou inativo.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Palabras que describen o modifican sustantivos.

definition: In operation or performing actions; not passive or inactive.
examples: She leads an active lifestyle with regular exercise.
Active participation is encouraged in the workshop.
The active ingredients in the medicine provide relief.

es.definition: El sonido producido por cuerdas vocales al hablar o cantar; también, la expresión de pensamientos o sentimientos.

pt.definition: O som produzido pelas cordas vocais ao falar ou cantar; também, a expressão de pensamentos ou sentimentos.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Palabras que nombran personas, animales, lugares, cosas, ideas o fenómenos.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Palabras que expresan acciones, estados o procesos.

definition: The sound produced by vocal cords when speaking or singing; also, the expression of thoughts or feelings.
examples: Her voice was beautiful and melodious.
He used his voice to advocate for change.
The book gives voice to the author's experiences.

es.definition: No realizando acciones; receptivo o no activo.

pt.definition: Não realizando ações; receptivo ou não ativo.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Palabras que describen o modifican sustantivos.

definition: Not performing actions; receptive or not active.
examples: He remained passive and didn't intervene in the argument.
The passive observer watched the birds in the park.
A passive attitude won't lead to success.

es.definition: Diferencias notables o reconocimientos por la diferencia entre dos o más cosas.

pt.definition: Diferenças notáveis ou reconhecimentos pela diferença entre duas ou mais coisas.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: Notable differences or recognitions for the difference between two or more things.
examples: There are several distinctions between the two theories.
He received many distinctions for his academic achievements.
The distinctions in flavor make each dish unique.

es.definition: Usos o solicitudes de algo en situaciones prácticas.

pt.definition: Usos ou solicitações de algo em situações práticas.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: Uses or requests for something in practical situations.
examples: The applications of this technology are vast and varied.
She submitted multiple job applications.
The applications for the grant came from all over the country.

es.definition: La acción de crear, construir o edificar algo.

pt.definition: A ação de criar, construir ou edificar algo.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: The action of creating, building, or erecting something.
examples: They are currently constructing a new bridge in the city.
Constructing a successful business takes time and effort.
He enjoys the process of constructing model airplanes.

es.definition: La tercera persona del singular del presente simple del verbo 'focus', que significa concentrarse en algo.

pt.definition: A terceira pessoa do singular do presente simples do verbo 'focus', que significa concentrar-se em algo.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: The third person singular present simple form of the verb 'focus,' which means to concentrate on something.
examples: She often focuses on her work for hours at a time.
He focuses on his studies to achieve his goals.
The team focuses on delivering high-quality products.

es.definition: Un tema o asunto de discusión, estudio o atención.

pt.definition: Um tema ou assunto de discussão, estudo ou atenção.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A topic or subject of discussion, study, or attention.
examples: The subject of the meeting is the budget for the next quarter.
History is her favorite subject in school.
The subject of the book is the human condition.

es.definition: Realizando una acción o una actuación en un escenario, en un trabajo, o en una actividad en general.

pt.definition: Realizando uma ação ou uma atuação em um palco, no trabalho ou em uma atividade em geral.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Palabras que expresan acciones, estados o procesos.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Palabras que describen o modifican sustantivos.

definition: Carrying out an action or performance on a stage, at work, or in an activity in general.
examples: She is performing a dance routine on stage tonight.
Performing well in exams requires preparation and focus.
The band is performing their new song at the concert.

es.definition: La acción de hacer algo o el acto de llevar a cabo una acción.

pt.definition: A ação de fazer algo ou o ato de realizar uma ação.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: The act of doing something or the process of carrying out an action.
examples: Taking action is essential to achieve your goals.
His quick action prevented a disaster.
The movie is full of thrilling action scenes.

es.definition: La tercera persona del singular del presente simple del verbo 'emphasize', que significa destacar o enfatizar algo.

pt.definition: A terceira pessoa do singular do presente simples do verbo 'emphasize', que significa destacar ou enfatizar algo.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: The third person singular present simple form of the verb 'emphasize,' which means to highlight or give special importance to something.
examples: She emphasizes the importance of good communication in the workplace.
The teacher emphasizes the need for careful research in the project.
The article emphasizes the benefits of a healthy lifestyle.

es.definition: Recibiendo algo de alguien o de un lugar.

pt.definition: Recebendo algo de alguém ou de um lugar.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: Receiving something from someone or a place.
examples: She is receiving a gift from her friend.
The company is receiving applications for the job opening.
Receiving positive feedback is always encouraging.

es.definition: Singular, inusual o único en su tipo; no como cualquier otro.

pt.definition: Singular, incomum ou único em seu tipo; não como qualquer outro.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

definition: Singular, unusual, or one of a kind; not like any other.
examples: Each snowflake is unique in its design.
His talent is truly unique and unmatched.
The restaurant offers a unique dining experience.

es.definition: Las cualidades o rasgos distintivos que definen a alguien o algo.

pt.definition: As qualidades ou traços distintivos que definem alguém ou algo.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: The qualities or distinctive traits that define someone or something.
examples: The characteristics of a good leader include empathy and decisiveness.
Each breed of dog has its own unique characteristics.
Understanding the characteristics of a culture is essential for effective communication.

es.definition: Alguien que realiza acciones o que lleva a cabo tareas.

pt.definition: Alguém que realiza ações ou executa tarefas.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: Someone who performs actions or carries out tasks.
examples: He is a doer who gets things done efficiently.
The organization needs more doers to achieve its goals.
Being a doer is an important quality in the business world.

es.definition: Un nombre propio de persona, comúnmente usado en inglés.

pt.definition: Um nome próprio de pessoa, comumente usado em inglês.

type_word.name: Proper Noun
type_word.description: Words that refer to specific names of people, places, or things.

definition: A proper noun of a person's name, commonly used in English.
examples: John is a popular name in many English-speaking countries.
She went to visit her friend John.
There are several famous people named John.

es.definition: La forma pasada del verbo 'eat', que significa consumir alimentos.

pt.definition: A forma passada do verbo 'eat', que significa consumir alimentos.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: The past form of the verb 'eat,' which means to consume food.
examples: He ate a delicious meal for dinner.
They ate all the cookies in the jar.
Ate is an important part of our daily routine.

es.definition: Una palabra interrogativa que se utiliza para preguntar acerca de una persona o identificar a alguien.

pt.definition: Uma palavra interrogativa usada para fazer perguntas sobre uma pessoa ou identificar alguém.

type_word.name: Pronoun
type_word.description: Words that replace nouns to avoid repetition.

definition: An interrogative word used to ask about a person or identify someone.
examples: Who is that person standing by the door?
Do you know who won the game?
Who will be attending the meeting?

es.definition: La forma pasada del verbo 'perform', que significa llevar a cabo una acción o realizar una actuación.

pt.definition: A forma passada do verbo 'perform', que significa realizar uma ação ou fazer uma atuação.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: The past form of the verb 'perform,' which means to carry out an action or give a performance.
examples: She performed a beautiful song on stage last night.
The surgery was performed by a skilled surgeon.
He has performed exceptionally well in his role.

es.definition: El artículo definido en inglés que se usa para señalar un objeto o grupo de objetos específico.

pt.definition: O artigo definido em inglês que é usado para indicar um objeto ou grupo de objetos específicos.

type_word.name: Article
type_word.description: Words that define nouns as specific or non-specific.

definition: The definite article in English that is used to indicate a specific object or group of objects.
examples: The book on the table is mine.
She is going to the store to buy groceries.
The sun is shining brightly today.

es.definition: Directo, claro y sin complicaciones; fácil de entender o hacer.

pt.definition: Direto, claro e sem complicações; fácil de entender ou fazer.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

definition: Direct, clear, and uncomplicated; easy to understand or do.
examples: His straightforward instructions made the process simple.
She appreciates straightforward communication in business.
The straightforward path led us to the destination quickly.

es.definition: Ir en línea recta hacia un objetivo; sin rodeos o intermediarios.

pt.definition: Ir em linha reta em direção a um objetivo; sem rodeios ou intermediários.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: Going in a straight line toward a goal; without detours or intermediaries.
examples: The direct route to the airport is the fastest.
He gave a direct answer to the question.
Direct flights are more convenient for travelers.

es.definition: La acción de comunicar pensamientos, sentimientos o ideas en palabras, gestos o de otra manera.

pt.definition: A ação de comunicar pensamentos, sentimentos ou ideias em palavras, gestos ou de outra maneira.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: The action of conveying thoughts, feelings, or ideas in words, gestures, or other ways.
examples: She is expressing her excitement about the upcoming event.
Expressing gratitude is important in maintaining relationships.
The artist is expressing his creativity through his work.

es.definition: Datos o conocimiento que se obtiene sobre un tema o situación.

pt.definition: Dados ou conhecimento obtido sobre um tema ou situação.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: Data or knowledge obtained about a topic or situation.
examples: The internet provides a vast amount of information.
Accurate information is essential for decision-making.
She shared valuable information with the team.

es.definition: La concentración mental en un objetivo o tarea específica.

pt.definition: A concentração mental em um objetivo ou tarefa específica.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: Mental concentration on a specific goal or task.
examples: Maintaining focus is crucial for productivity.
She has a sharp focus on achieving her career goals.
The camera allows you to adjust the focus.

es.definition: La forma pasada del verbo 'act', que significa llevar a cabo una acción o representar un papel.

pt.definition: A forma passada do verbo 'act', que significa realizar uma ação ou representar um papel.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: The past form of the verb 'act,' which means to carry out an action or perform a role.
examples: She acted in several movies during her career.
He acted as the lead character in the play.
Acted responsibly in handling the situation.

es.definition: Preposición que indica una posición o condición de contacto o cercanía.

pt.definition: Preposição que indica uma posição ou condição de contato ou proximidade.

type_word.name: Preposition
type_word.description: Words that show relationships between nouns and other words.

definition: A preposition indicating a position or condition of contact or proximity.
examples: Upon arriving at the airport, they were greeted by a driver.
He found the lost wallet upon searching the house.
Upon further consideration, she changed her mind.

es.definition: Similar en valor, cantidad o significado a algo más.

pt.definition: Semelhante em valor, quantidade ou significado a algo mais.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: Similar in value, quantity, or meaning to something else.
examples: The dollar and the euro are roughly equivalent in value.
This medication is the equivalent of the one you were taking before.
His actions are not equivalent to his words.

es.definition: Una fruta comestible con una piel fina y carne jugosa, generalmente de color rojo, amarillo o verde.

pt.definition: Uma fruta comestível com casca fina e carne suculenta, geralmente de cor vermelha, amarela ou verde.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: An edible fruit with thin skin and juicy flesh, typically red, yellow, or green in color.
examples: She enjoys eating a crisp apple as a snack.
Apple pie is a popular dessert in many countries.
He picked a fresh apple from the tree.

es.definition: La forma pasada del verbo 'eat', que significa consumir alimentos.

pt.definition: A forma passada do verbo 'eat', que significa consumir alimentos.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: The past form of the verb 'eat,' which means to consume food.
examples: They had already eaten when we arrived.
The delicious meal was quickly eaten by the hungry children.
Eaten is a common verb tense in everyday life.

es.definition: La forma posesiva del nombre propio 'John', indicando que algo pertenece a John.

pt.definition: A forma possessiva do nome próprio 'John', indicando que algo pertence a John.

type_word.name: Proper Noun
type_word.description: Words that refer to specific names of people, places, or things.

definition: The possessive form of the proper name 'John,' indicating that something belongs to John.
examples: John's car is parked in the driveway.
I met John's parents at the party.
John's book is on the table.

es.definition: La forma pasada del verbo 'be', que indica una acción en el pasado.

pt.definition: A forma passada do verbo 'be', que indica uma ação no passado.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: The past form of the verb 'be,' indicating an action in the past.
examples: She was happy yesterday.
It was a beautiful day.
John was at the party last night.

es.definition: La forma pasada del verbo 'eat', que significa consumir alimentos.

pt.definition: A forma passada do verbo 'eat', que significa consumir alimentos.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: The past form of the verb 'eat,' which means to consume food.
examples: They had already eaten when we arrived.
The delicious meal was quickly eaten by the hungry children.
Eaten is a common verb tense in everyday life.

es.definition: No conocido o no identificado; no familiar o no reconocido.

pt.definition: Não conhecido ou não identificado; não familiar ou não reconhecido.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

definition: Not known or unidentified; not familiar or unrecognized.
examples: The identity of the mysterious person is still unknown.
The origins of the ancient artifact remain unknown.
He received a letter from an unknown sender.

es.definition: Sin importancia o relevancia; no significativo o crucial.

pt.definition: Sem importância ou relevância; não significativo ou crucial.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

definition: Lacking importance or significance; not meaningful or crucial.
examples: In the grand scheme of things, this detail is unimportant.
His opinion on the matter is unimportant to me.
She considered the issue to be unimportant.

es.definition: El tercer singular del verbo 'want', que significa desear o querer algo.

pt.definition: A terceira pessoa do singular do verbo 'want', que significa desejar ou querer algo.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: The third person singular of the verb 'want,' which means to desire or wish for something.
examples: He wants a new car for his birthday.
She wants to travel the world someday.
What do he wants for dinner?

es.definition: Mostrando buenos modales o comportamiento cortés hacia los demás.

pt.definition: Mostrando boas maneiras ou comportamento cortês em relação aos outros.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

definition: Displaying good manners or courteous behavior towards others.
examples: He is always polite and respectful to everyone he meets.
Being polite is important in social interactions.
She sent a polite thank-you note for the gift.

es.definition: No directo o no expresado de manera clara y directa; utilizando rodeos o insinuaciones.

pt.definition: Não direto ou não expresso de maneira clara e direta; usando rodeios ou insinuações.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

definition: Not direct or not clearly and explicitly expressed; using detours or insinuations.
examples: He gave an indirect response to her question.
Indirect communication can lead to misunderstandings.
She used indirect methods to achieve her goal.

es.definition: Sonidos producidos por las cuerdas vocales de los seres humanos y utilizados para la comunicación.

pt.definition: Sons produzidos pelas cordas vocais dos seres humanos e usados para comunicação.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: Sounds produced by the vocal cords of humans and used for communication.
examples: His voice is deep and resonant.
She has a beautiful singing voice.
Voices are a fundamental part of human expression.

es.definition: La forma presente del verbo 'choose', que significa seleccionar o escoger algo.

pt.definition: A forma presente do verbo 'choose', que significa selecionar ou escolher algo.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: The present form of the verb 'choose,' which means to select or pick something.
examples: She is choosing a new outfit for the party.
Choosing the right words is essential in communication.
They are currently choosing a restaurant for dinner.

es.definition: En la mayoría de los casos o de manera común; por lo general.

pt.definition: Na maioria dos casos ou comumente; geralmente.

type_word.name: Adverb
type_word.description: Words that modify verbs, adjectives, other adverbs, or entire sentences.

definition: In most cases or commonly; typically.
examples: Generally, people enjoy spending time with their families.
He generally arrives at work early in the morning.
This medicine is generally safe for children.

es.definition: Preferido o elegido como la opción más deseable o adecuada.

pt.definition: Preferido ou escolhido como a opção mais desejável ou adequada.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: Favored or chosen as the most desirable or suitable option.
examples: His preferred method of transportation is cycling.
The preferred candidate for the job has extensive experience.
This is the preferred route for the journey.

es.definition: La forma presente del verbo 'create', que significa producir o hacer algo nuevo.

pt.definition: A forma presente do verbo 'create', que significa produzir ou fazer algo novo.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: The present form of the verb 'create,' which means to produce or make something new.
examples: She creates beautiful artwork using various techniques.
Innovation often creates new opportunities in business.
He creates a positive atmosphere in the workplace.

es.definition: Expresado de manera breve y clara, sin detalles innecesarios; sucinto.

pt.definition: Expresso de forma breve e clara, sem detalhes desnecessários; sucinto.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

definition: Expressed briefly and clearly, without unnecessary details; succinct.
examples: His concise explanation of the problem was appreciated.
A concise summary of the report is provided on the last page.
The speaker delivered a concise presentation.

es.definition: El arte o técnica de contar historias de manera efectiva, a menudo utilizando narración oral, escritura, imágenes u otros medios.

pt.definition: A arte ou técnica de contar histórias de forma eficaz, frequentemente usando narrativa oral, escrita, imagens ou outros meios.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: The art or technique of effectively telling stories, often using oral narration, writing, images, or other means.
examples: Storytelling is a powerful tool in marketing and advertising.
She has a talent for storytelling that captivates her audience.
The workshop focused on improving storytelling skills.

es.definition: Los aspectos más destacados o importantes de algo; momentos sobresalientes.

pt.definition: Os aspectos mais destacados ou importantes de algo; momentos sobressalentes.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: The most prominent or important aspects of something; outstanding moments.
examples: The highlights of the trip were the breathtaking views.
She shared the highlights of her career during the interview.
The documentary highlights the challenges of wildlife conservation.

es.definition: La responsabilidad de rendir cuentas por las acciones y decisiones, especialmente en un contexto profesional o de liderazgo.

pt.definition: A responsabilidade de prestar contas pelas ações e decisões, especialmente em um contexto profissional ou de liderança.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: The responsibility to be answerable for actions and decisions, especially in a professional or leadership context.
examples: Accountability is a core principle of effective leadership.
The company emphasizes accountability in its corporate culture.
There is a need for greater accountability in government.

es.definition: La forma presente del verbo 'state', que significa expresar o afirmar algo claramente.

pt.definition: A forma presente do verbo 'state', que significa expressar ou afirmar algo claramente.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: The present form of the verb 'state,' which means to express or assert something clearly.
examples: He is currently stating his opinion on the matter.
Stating the facts is essential in a legal context.
She is stating her case to the committee.

es.definition: Que es de utilidad o beneficio; que sirve para un propósito o función específica.

pt.definition: Que é de utilidade ou benefício; que serve para um propósito ou função específica.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

definition: That which is of utility or benefit; serving a specific purpose or function.
examples: This tool is very useful for home repairs.
Learning a new language can be useful in many situations.
Her advice proved to be quite useful.

es.definition: Relativo a la ciencia o al método científico; basado en el estudio sistemático y la observación.

pt.definition: Relativo à ciência ou ao método científico; baseado no estudo sistemático e na observação.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

definition: Relating to science or the scientific method; based on systematic study and observation.
examples: The scientific community conducts experiments to test hypotheses.
Scientific research has led to many advancements in medicine.
Her work is highly regarded in the scientific community.

es.definition: El participio pasado del verbo 'employ', que significa utilizar a alguien para un trabajo o tarea específica.

pt.definition: O particípio passado do verbo 'employ', que significa utilizar alguém para um trabalho ou tarefa específica.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

definition: The past participle of the verb 'employ,' which means to use someone for a specific job or task.
examples: He was employed by the company for over ten years.
Many skilled workers are currently employed in the construction industry.
Being employed provides financial stability.

es.definition: Más de lo necesario o apropiado; exagerado o extremadamente alto en cantidad o grado.

pt.definition: Mais do que o necessário ou apropriado; exagerado ou extremamente alto em quantidade ou grau.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

definition: More than necessary or appropriate; exaggerated or extremely high in quantity or degree.
examples: The excessive heat during the summer can be unbearable.
Her spending habits are often seen as excessive.
Excessive noise can be a nuisance to neighbors.

es.definition: Alejado en espacio o tiempo; no cercano en relación física o temporal.

pt.definition: Afastado no espaço ou no tempo; não próximo em relação física ou temporal.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

definition: Far away in space or time; not close in physical or temporal relationship.
examples: They live in a distant country and rarely visit.
The events of the past may seem distant, but they still impact us.
A distant relative I haven't seen in years.

es.definition: En menor cantidad o grado; comparativo de 'little'.

pt.definition: Em menor quantidade ou grau; comparativo de 'pouco'.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

type_word.name: Adverb
type_word.description: Words that modify verbs, adjectives, other adverbs, or entire sentences.

definition: In a smaller amount or degree; comparative of 'little'.
examples: He has less experience in this field than she does.
There is less sugar in this recipe compared to the original.
The movie was less exciting than I expected.

es.definition: Atractivo o interesante; capaz de capturar la atención o el interés de alguien.

pt.definition: Atraente ou interessante; capaz de capturar a atenção ou o interesse de alguém.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

definition: Attractive or interesting; capable of capturing someone's attention or interest.
examples: Her engaging personality makes her a great public speaker.
The book had an engaging plot that kept me reading.
The engaging artwork drew crowds to the gallery.
